=== About Me ===
<nowiki>[[File:IconsPage/IconKubuntuCircle.png]]</nowiki> My name is Todd Lyons, and I live in Ottawa, Canada.

<nowiki>[[File:IconsPage/IconKubuntuCircle.png]]</nowiki> I've been using Linux casually since May 1998 (Red Hat 5.0) and full time since January 2004 (Debian and Kubuntu, mostly).  I'm most pleased by the fact that I used Linux and free/open source software to complete a Master's degree and write a book from start to finish.

<nowiki>[[File:IconsPage/IconKubuntuCircle.png]]</nowiki> I'm not to be confused with the <nowiki>[[http://www.mrball.net/|other Todd Lyons]]</nowiki> who uses Linux.  He loves Mandriva and is an American, so we're nothing alike.  :)

=== LUG Membership ===

<nowiki>[[File:IconsPage/IconKubuntuCircle.png]]</nowiki> I am not presently a member of any LUGs, more due to time constraints than anything else, but I am a past member of the Board of Directors for the <nowiki>[[http://cinlug.org/|Central Indiana Linux Users Group, Inc.]]</nowiki> from 2004 to 2006.
